main event: A round, disc of glimmering silver descended and hovered in Waco, Texas before disappearing and reappearing multiple times.
interesting points: The object exhibited a glowing color and was observed disappearing and reappearing at different angles., The sighting lasted a considerable amount of time with multiple witnesses reporting the event., Pilots of trainer aircraft reported seeing the object many times., Ground personnel also confirmed seeing the object during the incident., The object was evaluated and suspected to be an aircraft based on the witness descriptions.
